entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
